00039 #include <QAbstractButton>
00040 #include <QFileDialog>
00041 #include <QDir>
00042 
00043 #include "RandomDeviateFactory.h"
00044 #include "RayTraceDialog.h"
00045 #include "TPhotonMapFactory.h"
00046 
00052 RayTraceDialog::RayTraceDialog( QWidget * parent, Qt::WindowFlags f )
00053 :QDialog ( parent, f ), m_numRays( 0 ), m_selectedRandomFactory( -1 ), m_fraction( 0.0 ), m_drawPhotons( false ), m_selectedPhotonMapFactory( -1 ), m_increasePhotonMap( false )
00054 {
00055         setupUi( this );
00056         connect( this, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT( saveChanges() ) );
00057         connect( buttonBox, SIGNAL( clicked( QAbstractButton* ) ), this, SLOT( applyChanges( QAbstractButton* ) ) );
00058 }
00059 
00065 RayTraceDialog::RayTraceDialog( int numRays, QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomFactoryList, double fraction, bool drawPhotons, QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonMapFactoryList, int selectedRandomFactory, int selectedPhotonMapFactory, bool increasePhotonMap, QWidget * parent, Qt::WindowFlags f )
00066 :QDialog ( parent, f ), m_numRays( numRays ), m_selectedRandomFactory(selectedRandomFactory), m_fraction( fraction ), m_drawPhotons( drawPhotons ), m_selectedPhotonMapFactory( selectedPhotonMapFactory ), m_increasePhotonMap( increasePhotonMap )
00067 {
00068         setupUi( this );
00069         raysSpinBox->setValue( m_numRays );
00070         for( int index = 0; index < randomFactoryList.size(); ++index )
00071         {
00072                 randomCombo->addItem( randomFactoryList[index]->RandomDeviateIcon(), randomFactoryList[index]->RandomDeviateName() );
00073         }
00074         if( m_selectedRandomFactory < 0 && randomFactoryList.size() > 0 )
00075                 m_selectedRandomFactory =0;
00076         randomCombo->setCurrentIndex( m_selectedRandomFactory );
00077 
00078         drawSpin->setValue( m_fraction );
00079         photonsCheck->setChecked( m_drawPhotons );
00080 
00081         for( int index = 0; index < photonMapFactoryList.size(); ++index )
00082         {
00083                 photonmapTypeCombo->addItem( photonMapFactoryList[index]->TPhotonMapIcon(), photonMapFactoryList[index]->TPhotonMapName() );
00084         }
00085         if( ( m_selectedPhotonMapFactory < 0  ) & ( photonMapFactoryList.size() > 0 ) ) m_selectedPhotonMapFactory = 0;
00086         photonmapTypeCombo->setCurrentIndex( m_selectedPhotonMapFactory );
00087 
00088         if ( m_increasePhotonMap )
00089                 increaseMapRadio->setChecked( true );
00090         else
00091                 newMapRadio->setChecked( true );
00092 
00093         connect( this, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT( saveChanges() ) );
00094         connect( buttonBox, SIGNAL( clicked( QAbstractButton* ) ), this, SLOT( applyChanges( QAbstractButton* ) ) );
00095 }
00096

00102 }

00152 
00156 void RayTraceDialog::applyChanges( QAbstractButton* button  )
00157 {
00158         if( buttonBox->buttonRole( button ) == 8 ) saveChanges();
00159 }
00160 
00164 void RayTraceDialog::saveChanges()
00165 {
00166         m_numRays = raysSpinBox->value();
00167         m_selectedRandomFactory = randomCombo->currentIndex();
00168 
00169         m_fraction = drawSpin->value();
00170         m_drawPhotons = photonsCheck->isChecked();
00171 
00172         m_selectedPhotonMapFactory = photonmapTypeCombo->currentIndex();
00173         if( newMapRadio->isChecked() )
00174                 m_increasePhotonMap = false;
00175         else
00176                 m_increasePhotonMap = true;
00177 }
